text: Nĩakaigĩrĩra moko make meerĩ igũrũ rĩa mũtwe wa thenge ĩyo ĩrĩ muoyo, na oimbũrĩre hau igũrũ rĩayo waganu wothe na ũremi wa andũ a Isiraeli, oimbũre mehia mao mothe, amacookererie igũrũ rĩa mũtwe wayo. Nĩakarekereria thenge ĩyo ĩĩthiĩre werũ-inĩ ĩmenyereirwo nĩ mũndũ ũrĩa ũthuurĩirwo wĩra ũcio.
